channel.title: About Lyax and Kelly Alix on Lyax
channel.description: Recent content in About Lyax and Kelly Alix on Lyax

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! I am Kelly Alix and since 2019 I assist entrepreneurs and companies with their questions about GDPR and to bring order to administrative chaos. I decided to join my husband Ken Bonny in the company that he founded in 2017. More Than Code now really is more than IT consultancy. I have a good 10 years of work experience at, among others, a bailiff's office and a collection agency.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact You can find different ways to contact me below. E-mail is my favourite way for a first contact. After the first contact other ways, such as video calls, can be used to discuss the details of the assignment. E-mail kelly@lyax.be Phone WhatsApp Text message +32 494 91 24 46 Telegram Twitter @KellyAlix Social media LinkedIn Facebook

item.title: Services
item.description: Paralegal services Data Protection – Application of GDPR Transcription Legal translations FR NL FR EN NL EN EN NL Privacy Policy / Cookie Policy / Terms and conditions General support for lawyers, notaries... Administrative services Accountancy A – Y Data Input / Data processing Invoice creation/mailing/follow-up Payment matching Credit Control / Accounts receivable management Office 365 (Word – Excel – Outlook – Powerpoint) Process optimisation Filemanagement A – Z Layout formatting Proofreading (NL and EN) Taking minutes - both during online and live meetings Is your specific assignment not listed?

Cookie Policy I strongly believe cookies are food! This is why my website only uses one functional cookie. The cookie: __cfduid This is a Cloudflare cookie that we need to have the website up and running. What does the cookie do? Cloudflare’s full explanation can be found here. It’s a temporary cookie that expires after 30 days. The cookie collects an anonymizes the IP addresses of visitors to detect if there is any malicious intent.

Legal notices Lyax is a division of More Than Code BV. Below you can find the official information for Lyax as this is known in the Crossroads Bank Of Enterprises and where you can always reach me.
